import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Logo from '../img/MEME.gif' function Meme({ meme, userInfo, setCurrentPage, bearer, setUserInfo }) { const userId = userInfo.id function archiveMeme(event) { event.preventDefault(); const url = 'http://localhost:8000/store' const method = 'post' const body = { users_id: userId, meme_url: meme } const data = { users_id: userId, meme_url: meme } axios({ url, method, body, data }) .then(refreshMemes(), setCurrentPage('profile')) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) } function refreshMemes(event){ axios({ url: "http://localhost:8000/api/user", method: "get", headers: {Accept: "application/json", Authorization: `Bearer ${bearer}`} }) .then(response => setUserInfo(previnfo => previnfo = response.data)) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) } return (

MEMEÂ· oir

setCurrentPage('profile')} className="prof img-fluid my-2" src={userInfo.profile_img} style={{ height: 100 }} />

{userInfo.name}


) } export default Meme
